description.value:
Trigger An unauthorized creature grasps the computer directly or with a tool

Effect The trap attempts to upload the triggering creature's soul into the computer. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[will|dc:40] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(3d10+15)[spirit]] damage.

Failure The creature's soul is temporarily pulled from their body. It takes @Damage[(6d10+30)[spirit]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 3}.

Critical Failure The creature's soul is pulled from its body and uploaded to a data module on the computer. Its body remains a soulless vessel, which slowly dies over the course of 1 week unless its soul is returned. Destroying the computer destroys its soul.

details.description: A computer is protected by a hybrid trap, which uploads the soul of all unauthorized users to an inert data module on the computer.
details.disable: @Check[arcana|dc:36] (expert) to drain the computer's magical energy, or @Check[computers|dc:36] (expert) to falsify authorized credentials, or @Check[thievery|dc:40] (expert) to disable the trap, or @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.spells.Item.Dispel Magic] (7th rank; counteract DC 34) to counteract the trap
